reviewText: I bought this tape as a complement to "Hard Questions, Straight Answers: For Boys" but it just did not have the same quality of presentation.  The title "For Boys" has a strong biblical foundation dealing with issues of morality and character, and this did not.  While the content was informative, it fell significantly short of what I wanted and expected.

I watched this video with my teens (15 & 17)  and it was very good.  The speakers talk in a language that is teen friendly but also to the point!!  It makes good sense.  I would recommend this for any one with teens who would like to promote abstinence.
